original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Senior Deputy Inspector General of Police Deshbandu Tennakoon has been appointed as the Acting Inspector General of Police.
Minister of Public Security Tiran Alles said the appointment was made by President Ranil Wickremesinghe
India to construct 10,000 houses under Phase-IV of Housing Project
Sri Lanka & Official Creditor Committee reach agreement on debt reworking
Finance Secretary grilled in 10 hour CID interrogation over Human Immunoglobulin imports
